props.arrayOfLibraries: Array of libraries to load: places, drawing, geometry, visualization
props.mapIds: Map IDs for cloud-based map styling
props.mapContainerStyle: Style object for the map container
props.mapContainerClassName: CSS class for the map container

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.content:
React Google Maps API provides a comprehensive set of React components for the Google Maps JavaScript API.

This library allows you to declaratively create maps, markers, overlays, and more using familiar React patterns.

**Installation**

loading.title: Loading the API
loading.content:
Before using any map components, you need to load the Google Maps JavaScript API. There are two approaches:

1. **LoadScript** - Load globally at app level
2. **JsApiLoader** - Load dynamically in components

googleMap.title: GoogleMap
googleMap.content:
The GoogleMap component is the core component that renders a Google Map. All other map components must be children of GoogleMap.

**Features:**
- Fully controlled via props
- Supports all map events
- Access map instance via onLoad callback

marker.title: Marker
marker.content:
The Marker component renders a marker on the map. Markers can be customized with icons, labels, animations, and event handlers.

**Note:** Marker is deprecated in favor of AdvancedMarkerElement, but remains widely used.

infoWindow.title: InfoWindow
infoWindow.content: InfoWindow displays content in a popup window above the map. It can be anchored to a marker or positioned at coordinates.

polyline.title: Polyline
polyline.content: Polyline draws a line on the map connecting a series of coordinates. Useful for routes, paths, and boundaries.

polygon.title: Polygon
polygon.content: Polygon draws a closed shape on the map. Useful for highlighting areas, regions, or zones.

rectangle.title: Rectangle
rectangle.content: Rectangle draws a rectangular shape on the map defined by bounds.

circle.title: Circle
circle.content: Circle draws a circular shape on the map defined by a center and radius.

drawingManager.title: DrawingManager
drawingManager.content:
DrawingManager enables users to draw shapes (markers, circles, polygons, etc.) directly on the map.

**Requires:** `drawing` library

trafficLayer.title: TrafficLayer
trafficLayer.content: TrafficLayer displays real-time traffic conditions on the map.

bicyclingLayer.title: BicyclingLayer
bicyclingLayer.content: BicyclingLayer displays bike paths and bike-friendly roads on the map.

transitLayer.title: TransitLayer
transitLayer.content: TransitLayer displays public transit routes and stations on the map.

heatmapLayer.title: HeatmapLayer
heatmapLayer.content:
HeatmapLayer visualizes data intensity with color gradients.

**Requires:** `visualization` library

kmlLayer.title: KmlLayer
kmlLayer.content: KmlLayer renders KML/KMZ files on the map.

directions.title: Directions
directions.content: DirectionsService calculates routes and DirectionsRenderer displays them on the map.

distanceMatrix.title: DistanceMatrixService
distanceMatrix.content: DistanceMatrixService calculates travel distance and time for multiple origins and destinations.

autocomplete.title: Autocomplete
autocomplete.content:
Autocomplete provides address/place suggestions as users type.

**Requires:** `places` library

searchBox.title: StandaloneSearchBox
searchBox.content:
StandaloneSearchBox provides a search box for places without requiring a map.

**Requires:** `places` library

overlayView.title: OverlayView
overlayView.content: OverlayView renders custom React components as map overlays at specific coordinates.

groundOverlay.title: GroundOverlay
groundOverlay.content: GroundOverlay displays an image on the map within specified bounds.

streetViewPanorama.title: StreetViewPanorama
streetViewPanorama.content: StreetViewPanorama displays Google Street View imagery.

streetViewService.title: StreetViewService
streetViewService.content: StreetViewService provides metadata about Street View coverage.

markerClusterer.title: MarkerClusterer
markerClusterer.content: MarkerClusterer groups nearby markers into clusters for better performance and UX with many markers.

infoBox.title: InfoBox
infoBox.content: InfoBox is a customizable alternative to InfoWindow with more styling options.
